Articles.Content: Probably a ways off, but my Jeb is getting up in years and has trained as many of his fellow Kerbals with "the right stuff" in docking and exploring planets as he cares to. He'd like to start calling that little valley in the twin craters of the Mun his own. Perhaps adding more real world challenges into the "getting there" and exploration would be nice, but once you've solar system mastered space travel, it would be nice to have a level two.
Suggested many times. The closest thing you can come to colonization is to send modules down to said planet/moon. As said before, suggest many times. Can we have a mod lock this thread?
yeah, this has been discussed to death. it might happen, but iirc harv said it would possibly be a post final release thing.

I'd like to see metal mining added along kethane, when they add that.

Then you could have a inflatable VAB and turn the metals you mined into parts.

Colonization would be taken to a new level once they add kerbals being able to pick up parts and weld them, attachments, cranes, and kerbal integrated fuel lines. So basically, Colonization is the kerbal attachments mod.

But, I like the Idea of making parts with mined metal so you don't have to haul them. Like, if your wheel was totally destroyed, you could make another from metal, and have a kerbal attach them. It would add a lot to crashes, if you get what I'm saying, which is that, if you crash a lander with a miner on it and some type of small parts maker, you could rebuild the lander and probably make a new base.

Summary:

If Kerbal could craft parts and create factories and mine metal and kethane + the kerbal attachments mod (With a few colonization parts or the H.O.M.E. mod.) would basically fulfill my needs for a colonization DLC or something.

Sorry for rambling.

What you want is Extraplanetary Launchpads v3.7.1.

It works similarly to kethane; you scan the planet/moon, drill for ore, smelt it into metal and build rocket parts. Which in turn can be used to build rockets to be launched from your 'extraplanetary launchpad'.

I wasn't looking for a mod.

I was saying that a combination of these mods:

Kethane

Extraplanetary launchpad

Kerbal Attachments mod (KAS)

H.O.M.E. Mod

(Maube B9 aerospace for the cargo bays.)

Would be substantial for Sqaud to put together and make a Colonization DLC, like, if you created a official modpack.

I was also looking for a mod that allows you to build single parts easily, without a setup and then use KAS to grab and repair rovers or other vehicles, like when a wheel completely explodes and is destroyed, you don't have to quickload, but you can repair.
